title: Parliament suspended over Harin's torches
content: Parliamentary proceedings were suspended for nearly 10 minutes this morning (24) following allegations by Leader of the House Minister Dinesh Gunawardena that an Opposition MP brought an unauthorised item into the chamber.A heated situation broke out over opposition MP Harin Fernando's having  brought three torches to Parliament.They were found during a police inspection.Gunawardena later claimed that serious damage such as hazardous chemical reactions could be caused with the aid of the torch and other such unapproved objects. MP Fernando defended himself, stating that he brought the torches in the event a power outage took place during the session.
